about_the_game: Dark Age of Death is a Singleplayer and NEW Co-OP Game that brings the medieval fantasy to life with stunning Graphics and "Open World" maps you can discover the worlds full with enemies. New adventures awaits you on these cursed lands. With bosses that are challanging to the player and with New Quests, Environments, Characters, Dialogue, Armor and Weapons. You can fight alone, with a small team or in armies for PvE and PvP battles. The players can explore the Ruins, Dungeons, Castles there are Empires that you can join and Raid other Kingdoms with your King, gain fame wealth and items or die in battle and ascend to Valhalla.

New adventures awaits you on these cursed lands. With bosses that are challanging to the player and with New Quests, Environments, Characters, Dialogue, Armor and Weapons. You can fight alone, with a small team or in armies for PvE and PvP battles. The players can explore the Ruins, Dungeons, Castles there are Empires that you can join and Raid other Kingdoms with your King, gain fame wealth and items or die in battle and ascend to Valhalla.
name: Dark Age of Death

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 480 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770K / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
